channel.title: CaribPvP by CaribHub - Creating the Private server Network
channel.description:
[center][SIZE=5][CENTER][IMG]http://caribpvp.com/img/logo.png[/img] [CENTER][url=http://Caribpvp.com]Home | [/url] [url=http://Caribpvp.com/PlayCPK.jar]Play Now[/url] | [url=http://forums.caribpvp.com]Forums (Propagating)[/url]
[SIZE=5]FOLLOW US ON SNAPCHAT FOR EVENTS & UPDATES : CaribHUB[/SIZE]
CaribHub aims to provide a private server network which covers each and every popular online game. During this year we aim to establish atleast three of these servers including CaribPvP - Runescape Private Server / CaribPvP-Craft - Minecraft Server / And an additional undetermined server[/CENTER]
[SIZE=4][FONT=Century Gothic]We currently Offer:[/FONT][/SIZE]
[ul][*]24.7 Vps Hosted Server [*]IPB Forum Community [*]Live Support - Skype: BoboPVP [*]Staff Oppurtunities [*]Auto Voting [*]Auto Donations [*]Merger Considerations [*]Etc. [*][/ul]
[b][i]Shops Area[/i][/b] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h7Beu/84032ffef6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h7Bzl/70c699039f.jpg[/img]
[b][i]PvP Target System[/i][/b] [IMG]http://puu.sh/h7Bvz/9c2c09e7b2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/h8CxC/4d4a8e744f.jpg[/img]
[b][i]SLAY THE MONSTERS OF THE WORLD[/i][/b]
[img]http://gyazo.com/5234910f23074d985377049209e14e1f.png[/img][img]http://gyazo.com/e1eb9cf74faf0b7a27e068435b41f977.png[/img][img]http://gyazo.com/f7f7dafc18e75538341bc082114bb3d8.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/7f1da1bd0800e46e538be412cbd4ee85.png[/img]
[b][i]TAKE ON THE MIGHTY GODS[/i][/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/8c9664fe05302a66e460ae13801629c4.png[/img][img]http://gyazo.com/abcd8d769743dac08360da298d54fe54.png[/img][img]http://gyazo.com/7e6dcf31db228258a6ccdaaeab397cdc.png[/img]
[b][i]DEFEAT THE EPIC BOSSES[/i][/b] [img]http://gyazo.com/6313ab5a19c386f9f37bdf48ee2eaa5a.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/b9c26f91b7f42272e91f9ba2e34e2850.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/774e0d4f8e529fc751d9f6454001e2b3.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[color=#32CD32][SIZE=6][b][CENTER][i]☆☆☆ Skilling and Hard Work ☆☆☆[/i][/CENTER]
[CENTER][i][b]Max out with every working skill![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/5240605dafdb0bba2ee45932059ce4fd.png[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/263af73bd21e0ce01a0c3aba0b23e097.png[/img] [i][b]Select your training spot![/b][/i] [img]http://gyazo.com/9bb3e510feec00115f735e5063a7086b.png[/img]
[SIZE=6]The server is in developement so we accept all feedback, but ask that you refrain from "LEECH" or "Won't play" comments as they add nothing of value.[/SIZE][/CENTER][/center]

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:29, topic:550989”][quote author=EpicPvP link=topic=669905.msg4482445#msg4482445 date=1431128429]
FREE TODAY LOGIN AND TYPE ::veteranclaim FOR FREE VETERAN RANK!
[/quote]
“A java exception has occured” when I try to run the client
EDIT: Nevermind, installing JDK 1.8 right now; should fix it.
EDIT2: Nope, it still doesn’t work[/quote]

If you downloaded the latest java it should work link - https://java.com/en/download/
Else message me on skype - bobopvp I’ll fix it for you.

item.title: CaribPvP by CaribHub - Creating the Private server Network
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I noticed that you said that your VPS is Clamhost. Believe me they seem decent at first, but many don’t realise that if you bought a Windows VPS, you actually have to pay serious money after your 180 day trial Windows Operating System is finished. Just warning you incase you didn’t know.

[i]It is also vital that you activate the Operating System if you have selected Windows. either with your own Key or a 180 day Trial can be activated. Please do be aware if the Operating System is not active your VPS will automatically shutdown[/i]

Read full topic
item.source: CaribPvP by CaribHub - Creating the Private server Network
